sentences.en: Be sure to punctuate your sentences with the correct marks in the right places.
sentences.cn: 一定要在你文章句子中的正确地方标上正确的标点符号.
好, 我再给这个句子重新打一下标点.

sentences.en: Punctuate person , pay close attention to also.
The children have not yet learned to punctuate correctly.
sentences.cn: 这些小学生尚未学会正确使用标点符号.

sentences.en: The pupils have not yet learned to punctuate correctly.
sentences.cn: 小学生尚未学会正确使用标点符号.

sentences.en: The silence was occasionally punctuated by laughter.
We have not yet learned to punctuate correctly.
sentences.cn: 我们尚未学会正确使用标点符号.

sentences.en: You should punctuate the whole passage with correct marks in order to make its meaning.
sentences.cn: 你应用正确的标点将整段文章点开,以使意思更明了.

words.tran_cn: 不时打断；强调；加标点于

trans.tran_cn: 不时打断；强调；加标点于
trans.tran_en: to divide written work into sentences, phrases etc using  comma s  ,  full stop s  etc

trans.tran_cn: 加标点符号，不时打断，加强，强调
不时打断某事物，使用标点符号
